mapper.select: SELECT CP.CP_NAME AS `회사이름`, CN.CAR_NAME AS `자동차이름`, MY.DATE_YEAR AS `연식`, COUNT(OP.`OPTION`) AS `옵션갯수` FROM CAR_INFO CI INNER JOIN CAR_INFO_OPTIONS COP ON CI.CI_PK = COP.CI_FK INNER JOIN COMPANY CP ON CP.CP_PK = CI.CP_FK INNER JOIN CAR_NAME CN ON CN.CN_PK = CI.CN_FK INNER JOIN MODEL_YEAR MY ON MY.YEAR_PK = CI.YEAR_FK INNER JOIN OPTIONS OP ON OP.OP_PK = COP.OP_FK GROUP BY CP.CP_NAME, CN.CAR_NAME, MY.DATE_YEAR;
mapper.insert: insert into CAR_INFORS (CAR_NAME, YEAR, CAR_INFOR_ID, COMPANY_ID) values (#{CAR_NAME}, #{YEAR}, #{CAR_INFOR_ID}, #{COMPANY_ID}) ;
